p: The Ae. aegypti Rockefeller/UGAL mosquito strain was maintained in laboratory culture. Adult mosquitoes were reared on 10% sugar solution at 27 °C under a photoperiod of 12 h: 12 h (Light: Dark) and 80% relative humidity [ 31, 32]. Specific-pathogen-free BALB/c mice blood were purchased from Beijing Vital River Laboratory Animal Technology (licensed by Charles River). The Aedes albopictus cell line C6/36 cells were maintained in RPMI 1640 medium supplemented with 10–20% FBS at 28 °C and 5% (vol/vol) CO 2.
